entry.title: homepage
entry.content:
About me

Hanyi Wu (å´ç€šé€¸) is currently pursuing his PhD degree at Tsinghua University. He is interested in integrating the AI & RS for climate adaptation, espectially the health risk assessment and environmental & agricultural remote sensing. He developed remote sensing approaches combined with machine learning in order to characterize patterns of cities not only at large scales but also a spatially-explicit resolution close to people's living environment to understand health. Prof. Wenjia Cai is my advisor.

Date of birth : 2000-10-29

Native place : Nanan, Quanzhou, Fujian, China

Website : https://ross-wu-creat.github.io/

E-mail : wuhanyi25@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn; hanyi.wu@mail.bnu.edu.cn; hywu1029@163.com

Education

DegreeInstitutionMajorPeriodAdvisor
PhDTsinghua University (THU)Ecology2025-Prof. Wenjia Cai
MScBeijing Normal University (BNU)Cartography and GIS2022-2025Prof. Yaozhong Pan
BScNanjing University of Information Science & Technology (NUIST)Remote sensing2018-2022Prof. Yongming Xu

Research interest

Research interest
Include
AI & RS for climate adaptationQuantifing the co-benefits of climate mitigation and health adaptation technology, high resolution social-economic system simulation and mapping, etc.
Health Risk Assessmentheat health risk assesment, human exposure, environmental justice, etc.
Agricultural Remote Sensingcrop mapping (especially early and in-season large-scale mapping), timeseries satellite data reconstruction in agricultural scenarios, phenology extraction, soil erosion and agricultural sustainability, etc.
